Sometimes a light reddish color may appear in the inside of the nugget due to the characteristics of the chicken. Please be assured that the product is cooked well in the manufacturing factory and restaurant.
* Prices may differ at selected restaurants and for delivery.
* Comes with 1 sauce of your choice.
